titleStmt.title: The duty of such as would walke worthy of the Gospel: to endeavour union, not division nor toleration. Opened, in a sermon at Pauls, upon the Lords Day, Feb. 8. 1646. / By Matthevv Nevvcomen, preacher of the Gospel at Dedham in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Newcomen, Matthew, 1610?-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.M. for Christopher Meredith, at the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: The I in imprint date is crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
